kateacuff.comment: While I support the changes being made to the student code of conduct, I am concerned about the potential impact on students' privacy rights and their ability to use phones responsibly.

grahampaige.comment: The motion carries. We're moving forward with this resolution. So we'll move to item number two which is the agenda change. And since there are no other comments, motions, anything else related to that? Okay, if not, then we'll move to the next item. Item three is approval of the consent agenda. Are there any changes to the consent agenda? If not, Mrs. Osbourne, could you please make a motion to approve the consent agenda?
